survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the workplace coffee station to improve its quality and service.

questions.question_text: How often do you use the workplace coffee station?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use the workplace coffee station?

questions.question_text: What types of coffee do you typically consume at the workplace coffee station? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What types of coffee do you typically consume at the workplace coffee station? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of coffee provided at the workplace coffee station?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of coffee provided at the workplace coffee station?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the workplace coffee station?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the workplace coffee station?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and maintenance of the coffee station?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and maintenance of the coffee station?

questions.question_text: Do you feel the coffee station is adequately stocked with supplies (e.g., coffee, milk, sugar)?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Do you feel the coffee station is adequately stocked with supplies (e.g., coffee, milk, sugar)?

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to contribute to a coffee fund for higher-quality beans or additional options?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to contribute to a coffee fund for higher-quality beans or additional options?

questions.question_text: What additional beverages or snacks would you like to see at the coffee station? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What additional beverages or snacks would you like to see at the coffee station? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How important is the availability of a coffee station to your overall workplace satisfaction?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How important is the availability of a coffee station to your overall workplace satisfaction?

questions.question_text: Any additional comments or suggestions regarding the workplace coffee station?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: Any additional comments or suggestions regarding the workplace coffee station?
